property.name: plugin.folders
property.description: Directories where plugins are located. Each element may be a relative or absolute path. If absolute, it is used as is. If relative, it is searched for on the classpath.

property.name: plugin.auto-activation
property.description: Defines if some plugins that are not activated regarding the plugin.includes and plugin.excludes properties must be automaticaly activated if they are needed by some actived plugins.

property.name: plugin.includes
property.description: All active sensors are listed here.

property.name: plugin.excludes
property.description: Regular expression naming plugin directory names to exclude.
